thread.title: BRIEF-JA Solar Holdings Co Says General Meeting Of Shareholders To Be Held On March 12

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-JA Solar Holdings Co Says General Meeting Of Shareholders To Be Held On March 12

organizations.name: reuters) - ja solar holdings co ltd

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - JA Solar Holdings Co Ltd:
* JA SOLAR HOLDINGS CO LTD - ‍CALLED AN EXTRAORDINARY GENERAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON MARCH 12, 2018​
* JA SOLAR HOLDINGS - ‍ CALLED EGM TO VOTE ON PROPOSAL TO APPROVE PLAN OF MERGER AMONG JASO HOLDINGS, JASO PARENT, JASO ACQUISITION AND CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
